text: Husai mɨkemegha gɨvazɨma, Apsalom ko Israelian gumaziba bar kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Husain mɨgɨrɨgɨaba bar dera, egha Ahitofelɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨabagh afira.” Guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God faragha Apsalom gasɨghasɨghasa nɨghnɨki. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uabɨ men nɨghnɨziba fezɨ, me Husain akabar gɨn zui. Guizbangɨra Ahitofelɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨaba da dera, ezɨ puvatɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God me gamizɨ, me akar kamɨn gɨn ghuzir puvatɨ.
